title: DFL 2.0 model naming appears restricted to default names
body:
I would like to be able to choose DFL 2.0 model names that are descriptive and memorable. 

## Actual behavior
 
If I choose a descriptive model name, for example, saehd_192_256_42, the input will be accepted and the model files will be saved with that filename, but when I re-start training and attempt to select that saved model (option 0), the program ignores the saved model and starts a new model, with the new model files being named "saehd_SAEHD_*",  

It appears that the model names are restricted to certain defaults, e.g. "saehd_".
A workaround is possible by renaming the previously saved model files to the DFL 2.0 default names, for example, "saehd_SAEHD_data.dat." but the default naming conventions are not very descriptive or memorable.  

## Steps to reproduce

Choose a model name other than the five-character default model name, for example, saehd.

## Other relevant information:  Latest commit, DFL version 2.0.
